core.sort_tuples¶

core.sort_tuples(tuple_list, element_to_sort_by=1)[source]¶

Sort a list of tuples by a given element (default 1 (second element))

Parameters

tuple_list (list) – an unsorted list of tuples

Returns

tuple_list – a list of tuples sorted by their 2nd term

Return type

list

Examples

Sort a list of (key, value) by their values

import cloudburst as cb
tl = [("CONCURRENT", 5), ("STUDIO", 2), ("TEST", 8)]
tl = cb.tuple_list(tl)
print(tl)

cloudburst
